data.text: @lucyfarago @wayneni26371136 @CBCOttawa going to be widely available in every pharmacy in the US soon. you test postive, you get the pill on the spot and wake up the next day fine.
@drtyUnclSmm @mcfarwl @CBCOttawa @JustinTrudeau he already risked votes, he is done. time for commons sense and move on with life.
@galileo1 @CBCOttawa yup and the US and UK...its beginning April
@DNSabine @CBCOttawa It's a special kind of foolishness, isn't it?
@CBCOttawa Ivermectin, just like Japan and India.

@CBCOttawa Wait, do you mean they've not been allowed to offer antivirals to patients during a viral pandemic?

Please explain.
@wayneni26371136 @CBCOttawa Sort of not true. Supply of covid pill is limited..for now. I've a friend who worked on this. More is on its way.

@CBCOttawa Actually should be dispensed with the home test kit. No different than province of Ontario , which is currently providing as precaution  free potassium pills to every household within,5 km radius of Pickering nuclear power station 
#Pfizer

@mcfarwl @CBCOttawa Also, people aren't taking the mRNA shot as carelessly as they were in the beginning and i'm pretty sure they expire quickly. So its not like @JustinTrudeau is going to risk votes by throwing more money away
